name: Terminal Sickness
description:
Terminal Sickness - Part 1 A story driven text adventure following a mother's survival after the outbreak of a global pandemic.

Basic Commands attack - attack an agent with a held weapon give - give a held item to an agent go - travel to a location or through an exit interact - interact with a structure inventory - show inventory look - look at a location, item, structure or agent pick up / drop - pick up or drop an item restart - restart the game (current progress will be lost) save / load - save or load the state of the game search - search a structure for hidden items talk - talk to another agent unlock / lock - unlock or lock an exit with a held key use - use an item
Designer / Developer Andy Turner

Testers Adam Nellis
